Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pilosulin-3a (Allergen Myr p II; Pilosulin-2; ants, insects, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Myrmecia pilosula (Jack jumper ant) (Australian jumper ant)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.15639237]15% hemolytic activity at 10 μM, 40% hemolytic activity at 100 μM against human erythrocytes.
Sequence Information.Function: Has hemolytic activity. Causes an allergic reaction in human.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains one disulfide bond and C-terminal amidation.

Literature.Title: Characterisation of major peptides in 'jack jumper' ant venom by mass spectrometry.
Literature.Author: Davies NW, Wiese MD, Brown SG.

Literature.Title: Expression of jumper ant (Myrmecia pilosula) venom allergens post-translational processing of allergen gene products.
Literature.Author: Donovan GR, Street MD, Tetaz T, Smith AI, Alewood D, Alewood P, Sutherland SK, Baldo BA.
